secondaryTitle: Custom, handcrafted portraits that capture the unique personality of your furry friend
uploadYourPhotoDesc: Submit your favorite photo of your pet through our simple order form.
weCreateYourPortraitDesc: Our artists carefully craft a beautiful portrait capturing your pet's unique personality.
receiveYourMasterpieceDesc: Your finished portrait is carefully packaged and delivered straight to your door.
readyImmortalizeYourPetDesc: Order your custom pet portrait today and transform your favorite photo into a timeless work of art.
orderYourPetPortraitDesc: Fill out the form below to place your order. We'll contact you to confirm details and begin creating your custom portrait.
personalInformationDesc: Please provide your contact details so we can reach you about your order.
orderDetailsDesc: Tell us about your pet and the portrait you'd like.
clickUploadOrdrag: Click to upload or drag and drop
additionalInformationDesc: Tell us any specific details about your pet or the portrait style you'd like...
whoAreWeDesc: We are entrepreneurs who create personalized, handmade portraits that capture your furry friend's unique personality.
socialMediaInfo: You can follow us or contact us on our social networks.
